briefdescription.para: Creates a new transport for the given Unix domain socket path.

detaileddescription.para: This creates a client-side of a transport.

xrefdescription.para: once we add a way to escape paths in a dbus address, this function needs to do escaping.

parameterdescription.para: the path to the domain socket.
TRUE to use abstract socket namespace
address where an error can be returned.

simplesect.para: a new transport, or NULL on failure.

briefdescription.para: Creates a new transport for the given binary and arguments.

detaileddescription.para: This creates a client-side of a transport. The process will be forked off and executed with stdin/stdout connected to a local AF_UNIX socket.

parameterdescription.para: the path to the domain socket.
address where an error can be returned.

simplesect.para: a new transport, or NULL on failure.

parameterdescription.para: the address entry to try opening
return location for the opened transport
